Uses of Package
com.vectorprint.report.itext.style

  • Packages that use com.vectorprint.report.itext.style 
    Package Description
    com.vectorprint.report.itext
    primary classes for building iText reports; typically one will first study the possibilities of styling and annotating existing dataclasses, extend DataCollectorImpl and use ReportRunner to run the report.
    com.vectorprint.report.itext.debug
    classes to support debugging your reports by adding visual feedback to the report in a layer and information on the setup and the styling used
    com.vectorprint.report.itext.mappingconfig
    An interface for for processing information on how to map data to report parts.
    com.vectorprint.report.itext.style
    interfaces and classes to support configurable styling of iText reporting elements in a css like manner.
    com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.conditions
    classes to support conditional application of styling
    com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.css  
    com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.parameters
    interfaces and classes to provide parameterizing objects
    com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.stylers
    Parametrizable classes responsible for styling.
  • Classes in com.vectorprint.report.itext.style used by com.vectorprint.report.itext 
    Class and Description
    BaseStyler
    Stylers are responsible for styling iText building blocks (Elements, fields) for reports.
    DocumentStyler
    Responsible for setting properties of the document such as page size, margins, encryption etc.
    StyleHelper 
    StylerFactory
    Responsible for providing ReportGenerators and ElementProducers with stylers.
  • Classes in com.vectorprint.report.itext.style used by com.vectorprint.report.itext.debug 
    Class and Description
    BaseStyler
    Stylers are responsible for styling iText building blocks (Elements, fields) for reports.
    StylerFactory
    Responsible for providing ReportGenerators and ElementProducers with stylers.
    ZebraStripes 
  • Classes in com.vectorprint.report.itext.style used by com.vectorprint.report.itext.mappingconfig 
    Class and Description
    StylerFactory
    Responsible for providing ReportGenerators and ElementProducers with stylers.
  • Classes in com.vectorprint.report.itext.style used by com.vectorprint.report.itext.style 
    Class and Description
    BaseStyler
    Stylers are responsible for styling iText building blocks (Elements, fields) for reports.
    BaseStyler.ALIGN
    enum constants for horizontal and vertical alignment combinations
    BaseStyler.POSITION
    enum constants for indicating top, right, left and bottom combinations for example for borders on rectangles
    DocumentStyler
    Responsible for setting properties of the document such as page size, margins, encryption etc.
    FontLoader
    support for loading of iText and awt fonts, also from URL or stream, note that you have to call FontLoader.setLoadAWTFonts(boolean) and / or FontLoader.setLoadiText(boolean) to load any fonts.
    FontLoader.LOADSTATUS
    for feedback on the loading of fonts.
    FormFieldStyler.FIELDTYPE 
    StylerFactory
    Responsible for providing ReportGenerators and ElementProducers with stylers.
    StylingCondition 
    ZebraStripes 
  • Classes in com.vectorprint.report.itext.style used by com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.conditions 
    Class and Description
    StylingCondition 
  • Classes in com.vectorprint.report.itext.style used by com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.css 
    Class and Description
    BaseStyler
    Stylers are responsible for styling iText building blocks (Elements, fields) for reports.
  • Classes in com.vectorprint.report.itext.style used by com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.parameters 
    Class and Description
    BaseStyler.ALIGN
    enum constants for horizontal and vertical alignment combinations
    BaseStyler.POSITION
    enum constants for indicating top, right, left and bottom combinations for example for borders on rectangles
    FormFieldStyler.FIELDTYPE 
  • Classes in com.vectorprint.report.itext.style used by com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.stylers 
    Class and Description
    BaseStyler
    Stylers are responsible for styling iText building blocks (Elements, fields) for reports.
    BaseStyler.ALIGN
    enum constants for horizontal and vertical alignment combinations
    BaseStyler.POSITION
    enum constants for indicating top, right, left and bottom combinations for example for borders on rectangles
    DocumentStyler
    Responsible for setting properties of the document such as page size, margins, encryption etc.
    FormFieldStyler
    Responsible for drawing a form field based on the position of a table cell.
    FormFieldStyler.FIELDTYPE 
    StylerFactory
    Responsible for providing ReportGenerators and ElementProducers with stylers.
    StylingCondition
